price: Mengapa aku akan menyembah tuhan-tuhan selain-Nya, jika (Allah) Yang Maha Pemurah menghendaki kemudaratan terhadapku, niscaya syafaat mereka tidak memberi manfaat sedikit pun bagi diriku dan mereka tidak (pula) dapat menyelamatkanku?
arabic: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدۡنِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ بِضُرّٖ لَّا تُغۡنِ عَنِّي شَفَٰعَتُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: a-attakhidhu min dūnihi ālihatan in yurid'ni al-raḥmānu biḍurrin lā tugh'ni ʿannī shafāʿatuhum shayan walā yunqidhūni
